result: Queestion 94) What is the capital of Mexico? 15 February 2012 The Capital of Mexico is Mexico City. More than 20 million people live in the metropolitan area, making it one of the largest cities in North America. It is located in the Valley of Mexico, in the southern part of the Central Mexican Plateau. The city was founded as Tenochtitlan by the Aztecs in the 13th century and became the capital of the Viceroyalty of New Spain in the 16th century. After Mexico's independence from Spain in 1821, it became the capital of the newly independent country. The city is home to numerous iconic landmarks such as the National Palace, the Angel of Independence and the Metropolitan Cathedral. It is also known for its vibrant culture, colorful traditional markets, and diverse cuisine.
